activities: PowerReviews provides software/service to online service companies to manage their user-generated content (ratings & reviews, Q&A, etc.). Clients may require that users enter a valid email address to verify identity for submitting the content. PowerReviews collects and stores the information, but does NOT use the information for marketing purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line data only (e-mail addresses, IP addresses)
recoursemech: We agree to cooperate and comply with the European Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
